ERRATA 

[Insert in Stimpson's Report on the Crustacea Collected by the 
 North Pacific Exploring Expedition. Smithsonian Miscellaneous 
 Collections, XLIX, 1907.] 

On pi. VIII, for I a read 2a. 

The figures numbered i on pi. xiii and i on pi. xv should be inter- 
 changed. 

On pi. XIV, figs. 5(1' and 5^ should be inverted. 

On pi. XVIII, two figures are numbered 5 ; the lower one should 
 be 7. 

On pi. XXI, figs. 2a and 2b should be inverted.
